name: Bunker Studios
tag_list: it, information-technology, saas, web, internet, portugal, porto, startup, mobile, ios, android, wordpress, ui, ux, user-interface
overview:
Bunker Studios is a portuguese IT Agency that creates powerful digital experiences, with a vision:

“We give great emphasis in the creation of intuitive and clear user interfaces, making its usage and navigation, a pleasant and great experience for the user.”

Our solutions are a result of the use of various areas related to IT, like User Interface Design, Web & Cloud Development, Mobile Development and Augmented Reality.

We build solutions for various digital platforms, from desktops to mobile and for various overseas markets like USA, Sweden, UK, Australia, Singapore, Oman, Malaysia, Germany and others.

Bunker Studios develops digital solutions for 3 markets:

BUSINESS 2 BUSINESS > User Interface and User Experience (creation of application maps, flow charts and user interface) > Website Development (use of CMS for content management) > Web applications (Cloud computing & Software as a Service) > Mobile applications (native applications for iOS, Android and hybrid) > Interactive systems (digital kiosks and dashboards) > Augmented Reality

BUSINESS 2 CONSUMER > Software as a Service > Web & Mobile games

BUSINESS 2 IT PROFESSIONALS > WordPress templates > HTML5 / CSS3 templates > User interface vector bundles > PSD para HTML service

We are partners of UPTEC (Science and Technology Park of University of Porto), winner of REGIO STARS 2013, in Brussels.

offices.address1: UPTEC - Parque de Ciência e Tecnologia da Universidade do Porto
offices.address2: Rua Actor Ferreira da Silva 100 Sala B4
